channel.title: Why do noobs do this?
channel.description:
Every 10 "How i play moparscape thread" I see one with a poll that doesn't make sense. How do they manage to accidentally do this so often?
[IMG]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p80/davidude36/Moparscape.jpg[/img]
Anyone got any idea?

item.title: Why do noobs do this?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

[quote=“dragonus18, post:44, topic:170870”][quote]
Lol mopar could own so many kids if he wanted to, there are like 10000 people who actually post around here, figure probably 80% of them are under 15, and he has all their emails and im names and stuff lol
[/quote]
no, he could not own them, as i don’t see how information about something makes you the owner of it. also, only around 1000 people actually post here regularly.[/quote]
Looks like we have an expert in the forums!

Read full topic

item.title: Why do noobs do this?
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“ninja nub, post:34, topic:170870”]Heres my statistics:

90% of the online community 12 years and younger

9% 13 yo +

1% 30-50 year old men looking for sex.

Now on topic:

Mscpers have a river flowing with idiocy in their heads, thinking the new topic button is broken, so they post polls.
And everyone who does that is like 9 years old. Can they not read? You have to be 13 to register, Not 12,11,10,9 or WHATEVER. But yet this IS the internet, you never know what you expect.[/quote]
50 year old virgin [size=1]*cough mopar[/size]

Read full topic

Now on topic:

Mscpers have a river flowing with idiocy in their heads, thinking the new topic button is broken, so they post polls.
And everyone who does that is like 9 years old. Can they not read? You have to be 13 to register, Not 12,11,10,9 or WHATEVER. But yet this IS the internet, you never know what you expect.

item.title: Why do noobs do this?
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

geel9:

Wow… I’m a moparscaper–I never did that. Wow, you’re idiots, thinking we’re all stupid.

For making that post, you are stupid.

Seriously, as if their horrible grammar wasn’t enough they make retarded polls with nothing to do with the subject.
We should make a “RAP- retarded-ass polls” detector that will stop any idiots from making stupid polls or allowing more than one option to be chosen when the poll says “yes” or “no”.

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 10, 2008, 05:06:12 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Cryme Time, post:23, topic:170870”][quote author=ThugLife link=topic=230851.msg1981871#msg1981871 date=1199656639]

It’s because they’re 13.

DID SOMEONE SAY 13 YEAR OLDS?
[/quote]
I’m a fuckin 12 year old wrestling addict so you better stfu.[/quote]

Fixed.

Read full topic

item.title: Why do noobs do this?
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

My little cousin did this allot when he first started, he just didn’t know you could post a regular message without a poll until I told him, not that they are stupid, just no common sense that all…Yea… i think i am primarily a moparscaper too… Thing is they are there to have a private server so they can be admins, I am doing it out of boredom lol

Read full topic
